name: Flasketball
description:
It's after hours at your chemical plant job, and all you can dream about is making it big in the NBA. It won't hurt to put in a little bit of practice before the morning shift comes in...

How to Play:

  1. Throw flasks into matching colored barrels to gain points! If you throw it into the wrong colored barrel, you lose points!
  2. After you clear the table of the existing flasks, press the colored buttons to spawn a flask of that color.

Each color adds/subtracts different amounts of points:

  • Red = 1 pt
  • Blue = 2 pts
  • Green = 3 pts

Controls:

  • Left Stick - Movement
  • Right Stick - Incremental Rotation
  • Grip Button (L/R) - Grab (hold down) / Release (let go)

Notes: 

Built using the Oculus Integration (v1.38) on Unity 2018.4.1f1. 

Cross Platform functionality should work, but has not been tested on SteamVR (try at your own risk - comment below if it works/doesn't work).
